name: add
description: Adds support for an external library to your project.
longDescription:
Adds the npm package for a published library to your workspace, and configures your default
app project to use that library, in whatever way is specified by the library's schematic.
For example, adding `@angular/pwa` configures your project for PWA support.

The default app project is the value of `defaultProject` in `angular.json`.

options.name: dryRun
options.description: When true, runs through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: force
options.description: When true, forces overwriting of existing files.

options.name: interactive
options.description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

options.name: defaults
options.description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
